table.name: vtiger_suggestions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_suggestions` ( `suggestionsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `suggestions` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `script` VARCHAR(256) DEFAULT NULL, `sugtype` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `sugstatus` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`suggestionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_suggestionscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_suggestionscf` ( `suggestionsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`suggestionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
